p: The collection site was San Rafael, which is a village in the municipality of Coxcatlan. This village is located southeast of the Tehuacan-Cuicatlan Valley at coordinates of 18°12′–18°14′ N and 97°07′–97°09′ W, which is 957 m above the sea level [ 43]. The climate is dry or arid with summer rains and a mean temperature of 22 °C [ 44].
